-- | Embedded haskell template using quasiquotes.
--   
@package ehs
@version 0.7.0


-- | See also <a>http://github.com/minpou/ehs/blob/master/README.md</a>
module Ehs
ehs :: QuasiQuoter
pehs :: QuasiQuoter
class Embeddable a
embed :: Embeddable a => a -> String
class EmbeddableIO a
instance [overlap ok] Functor Id
instance [overlap ok] Embeddable a => EmbeddableIO (IO a)
instance [overlap ok] Embeddable a => EmbeddableIO a
instance [overlap ok] Show a => Embeddable a
instance [overlap ok] Embeddable Text
instance [overlap ok] Embeddable Text
instance [overlap ok] Embeddable ByteString
instance [overlap ok] Embeddable ByteString
instance [overlap ok] Embeddable String
instance [overlap ok] Monad Id
instance [overlap ok] Applicative Id
instance [overlap ok] (Monoid w, Monad m) => Monoid (Mon m w)
